entry.title: Filtering of Sales Order items on action in Manage Sales Orders version 2
entry.content:
Dear All,

 

I've been working on extension of a RAP based application which is Manage Sales Orders version2 to place buttons on items table and show/hide the items based on button press correspondingly. 

I'm able to place buttons by extending the BDEF of a main BO and also projection view of items, I can see the debugger is triggering on action press but i'm not able to hide the items. please suggest on how can i achieve this?

 

Thanks in Advance.!

Ramesh

__PRESENT

entry.title: How to trigger a workflow in a shared environment via¬†CpWf-API/Proxy-API? (SBPA, Process Automation)
entry.content:
Dear experts,

how can a workflow be triggered in a shared environment via CpWf-API/Proxy-API?

Do the requests (Start, Cancel) have to be created/executed manually?
In my opinion, that would be a step backwards.

I would appreciate any tips/information, as the blog post is no longer being updated.
https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-blog-posts/sap-build-process-automation-how-to-transition-to-shared-environment/ba-p/14049650

Best regards
Alexander

entry.title: Edit not possible: locking of entity failed
entry.content:
Hello, I am working on a RAP application with a managed implementation with draft enabled. 

I have two entities: parent and child. 

When in Edit mode,  spamming the 'Create' button of the child entity results in the error 'Edit not possible: locking of entity 'Parent' failed'.

The problem is that after this the child section keeps 'loading' and the whole page kind of breaks because nothing happens after I click on discard draft or when trying to go back.

What can I do in this situation? Is there a way I can catch the error or a way of stopping the user from spamming the create button?

entry.title: Using SAP RAP managed Program, User Manual & File download functionality
entry.content:
Using SAP RAP managed (draft enabled) Program, I have created application for business users to upload the data from CSV file available on desktop(Presentation Server), display it on table in the application. Later on click on create, we update data in backend tables among other things. Its working fine.

Business users want additional feature, that there should be a 'download user manual' & 'Download file template' button on the home page/object page which they can use to download user manual (PDF file) and download template (CSV file) respectively.

How this functionality can be achieved? Please suggest.

I am using S4HANA ON PREMISE - SAP S/4HANA 2023, ABAP PLATFORM 2023.

entry.title: On pressing create button of item table of object page in RAP it's being navigated to new blank page
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I am new to RAP and trying to create a basic fiori app using RAP with draft action.

I have created sales order header and item table, interface view, projection view and metadata extension to display data on list report and object page.

Now when i perform create action i am succefully able to create header data while pressing create button item table navigation is being done to new page with blank screen and apply button in the footer and when i click on apply it automatically navigates to main object page with one line item available in item table.

Now i have below mentioned questions

1) How i can see the fields in blank sub object page which is displayed on create of item table.

2) Why blank screen is shown.

3) How can i achieve - Table row will be added in item table on press on create button.

I have attached the Txt file which contains Metadata and behaviour definition code and Sales header and item cds consumption view along with screenshots.

entry.title: What happened to e-learning and learning journey on RESTful ABAP programming in SAP Learning Hub
entry.content:
Good morning, all.

Logged into my learning hub after a long time. I remember i had book-marked some e-learning tutorial and some learning journeys specifically designed for ABAP RESTful programming model. Once in a while i used to go and refer them for my technical needs.

But now, i don't see them in my saved settings or anywhere in the catalogue. What's changed? why there are no learning journey which covers RESTful programming.

I tried searching with multiple terms...couldn't find any. Can someone help me understand what happened to those tutorials and what do we have now in case if you want similar tutorials.

entry.content: Assuming that my Fiori app is connected to an odata servici. Is it possible to display the returned results of the bapi into the fiori app?

entry.title: How to Hide a Combined Field Group (#AS_FIELDGROUP) by Default in a Fiori Elements List Report
entry.content:
I‚Äôm working on a CDS view where we use the #AS_FIELDGROUP annotation to display a combined field called ‚ÄúPlanned Start / End‚Äù.

 @ui: {
  lineItem: [
  {  hidden: true
  },
      { 
      type: #AS_FIELDGROUP,
        valueQualifier: 'StartEnd',
        label: 'Planned Start / End',
        importance: #LOW
         }
  ],
      fieldGroup: [
      {
      exclude: true,
      qualifier: 'StartEnd',
        position: 10 }]
  }
  @Consumption:{
      filter.hidden: true
       }
       
  MfgOrderPlannedStartEndDate;
    @ui: {
    lineItem: [
    { hidden: true }
    ],
    fieldGroup: [
    {
    qualifier: 'StartEnd',
      position: 20 }] }
  @Consumption:{
    filter.hidden: true
     }
  MfgOrderPlannedEndStartDate;

At the moment, this field is shown by default in the list report, but I‚Äôd like it not to appear by default, while still allowing users to add it manually via Adapt UI (table personalization). I tried using exclude: true, but it didn‚Äôt work as expected.

Do you know if there‚Äôs a way to achieve this behavior? Thanks in advance!

entry.content:

is it possible to enable multi input field on the Object Page items Table ?

regards

Filippo

entry.title: RAP : custom entity and data stream
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a very specific need to implement regarding Attachments.
I have implemented a custom entity (exposed with the alias "Attachments") to retrieve attachments from SAP backend to the FIORI Element app.
I have implemented the SELECT method of the RAP query provider (if_rap_query_provider), where i fill the attachment content along with key fields and file properties (mime type/file name).
When I test the GET request to download the file  (.../Attachments(<attachment_key>)/$value)  it returns nothing as content (the request is successful though / status 200)
In Debug mode, I checked that the SELECT method is being called and the content of the RAWSTRING field is filled with the correct data but i get nothing on the frontend side.

I declared the fields in the custom entity like this : 

@Semantics.largeObject : { 
	mimeType : 'MimeType', 
	fileName : 'FileName' } 
AttachmentContent : abap.rawstring(99999); 

@Semantics.mimeType: true 
MimeType : char128; 

FileName : char128;

I have noticed one other thing, not only the content of the response is empty but response headers also are not correct, i dont get what i expect for these two headers :

content-type : "application/octet-stream" instead of the actuel mime type 

content-disposition : "attachment; filename=entity." instead of the actual file name

What did I missed ? Is it possible to handle attachments using Custom Entities in the first place ?
I found nothing on blogs/internet. All examples i found are based on DDIC-CDS based entities, not Custom Entities.
Thanks a lot for your help üôÇ 
Note: I tried using type abap.rawstring(0) for field AttachmentContent but it's not working either

entry.title: Custom entity + unmanaged + rap + info popup
entry.content:
Hi,

Did anyone magage to convey the standard: 

MESSAGE ID 'ABC' TYPE 'I' NUMBER 001  

in sap rap to display for a user after he starts a ui5 report?

I just wanted to display couple of lines with infos after processing data (custom entity - unmanaged ) but apparently MESSAGE is ignored. RAISE EXCEPTION is not an option as the data I want to show is purely informative. 
I would rather avoid doing this in ui5 as it would require extending the standard button press "Search" action plus handling everything manually.

entry.title: Smart table does not show CDS view results
entry.content:
I was trying to display the sales document number on my Smart Table using CDS views. However, it only shows blank. What are wrong with my code?

<smartTable:SmartTable
  id="Results"
  enableAutoBinding="true"
  editable="false"
>
<Table items="{/ZSD_C_SDOC}">
<columns>
 <Column>
  <Text text="Sales Document"/>
 </Column>
</columns>
<items>
 <ColumnListItem>
  <cells>
   <Text text="{SalesDocNo}"/>
  </cells>
 </ColumnListItem>
</items>
</Table>
</smartTable:SmartTable>

 

@odata.publish: true
@EndUserText.label: 'Test CDS View'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true

define root view ZSD_C_SDOC as select from vbak
{
 key vbeln as SalesDocNo
}

entry.title: How to create dynamic value help cds views for domain value?
entry.content:
I create my domain value help like this. 

define view entity x
    as select from dd07t
{
    @ObjectModel.text.element: ['ddtext']
    key domvalue_l as domvalue,
    ddtext
}
where 
    domname = 'x'
    and as4local = 'A'
    and ddlanguage = $session.system_language

"Then use this value help like this 
@Consumption: { valueHelpDefinition: [{ entity: {name: 'X', element: 'domvalue'}}]}

The 'Problem' with this solution is i have to create a new cds view for each domain. I am looking for a more generic approach.

Is there a way to define one value help cds view and use this for all domains? Like the following idea. (Syntax is false, just want to show what i mean)

define view entity GENERIC_DOMAIN_VH
    as select from dd07t
{
    @ObjectModel.text.element: ['ddtext'] 
    key domvalue_l as domvalue,
    ddtext
}
where 
    domname = @parameter
    and as4local = 'A'
    and ddlanguage = $session.system_language

@Consumption: { valueHelpDefinition: [{ entity: {name: 'GENERIC_VALUE_HELP', element: <domainname>}}], filter: { multipleSelections: false} }

I tried it with association inside my cds view and parameter in the value help but without success.

CurrentExpected
Sales document no(header)Sales document no (header)
SalesDocument_01000000123
SalesDocument_01000000124
SalesDocument_01000000125

In my cds: it is declared that 

key vbak.vbeln  as SalesDocument

XML
<smartTable:SmartTable>
 <Table items="{Z_VBAKTEST}">
  <columns>
   <Column>
    <Text text="Sales Document No">
   <Column>
  </columns>
  <items>
   <ColumnListItem>
    <Text text="{SalesDocument}"/>
   <ColumnListItem>
  </items>
 </Table>
</smartTable:SmartTable>

If the data count is more than 1500 it hangs or becomes un-responsive.

entry.title: Including @OData.publish:true on v4 OData service.
entry.content:
I have created 2 Odata services which I intend to use one on Fiori app, and the other one of non-sap middleware in which contains the following:

Data definition, Behaviour definition, Service binding, Service definition, Class. 

 

Do I still need to declare the annotation @odata.publish: true if the Local Service Endpoint of the Service Binding is already published?

entry.title: Fiori, intent based navigation, annotation in CDS
entry.content:
I have a CDS view, in which 2 columns have intent based navigation for the same semantic object and action.

      .lineItem: [{ type: #WITH_INTENT_BASED_NAVIGATION,
                       semanticObjectAction: 'display' }]
      @Consumption.semanticObject: 'Material'
      ProductA,
      .lineItem: [{ type: #WITH_INTENT_BASED_NAVIGATION,
                       semanticObjectAction: 'display' }]
      @Consumption.semanticObject: 'Material'
      ProductB,

 

The goal is that by clicking on productA and productB, the referred Fiori App (MM03 Fiori App in my case) should be called with productA / productB in the "Material" field.

Sorrowfully, the MM03 App takes the product number only if the  column name in my CDS view is "Material". 

 

Could someone help if there is a possibility (preferably in the CDS view?) to use the values from columns ProductA and ProductB for the navigation (= mapping the parameter)?

 

ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA

entry.title: RAP: Which Activity (ACTVT) should be used in Access Control for Access Category "Value Help/F4"
entry.content:
Hi all,

in an Authorization Object in ABAP Cloud the Activities are mapped to one of the three Categories "Read", "Write", "Value Help".

The Categories are used in Business catalogs (where "Value Help" is labeled as "F4"), Role/Role Template Assignments, etc.

For Activities there are standard values (see eg onpremise in tables acl_actvt/acl_actvtt): 01 for Create, 02 for Change, 03 for Display, 08 for Delete

03 maps to Access Category Read

01,  02, 08 maps to Write

But there is no obvious activity value for Access Category "Value Help".

What activity do you use for Value Help?

Thanks for suggestions, pointers to documentation, tutorials, etc!

Regards,

  Wolfgang
